header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Next holidays, having help in the house, travelling, Singapore, food and drink.
header.activity: Close family catching up with news over a meal.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements

speaker.dialect_rep: I may have a slight Somerset accent
speaker.occupation: retired artist and antique dealer/gallery owner
